titles: What house number does Andy live at?
clues: Andy's house has a garage door which is painted green.
It can't be too hard, thinks Charlie, because Andy's street only has 29 houses and one post office.
Charlie also remembers that Andy's house is on the side of the street with all the even numbers.
Charlie can remember some things. He knows his friend lives in a house which is a multiple of 3.
For as long as Andy has known him, Charlie could never remember what house number Andy lived at.
The house Charlie lives in has a big garden but no garage.
Charlie lives in a white house at number 2.
Charlie loves to go round to play games at Andy's house.
Charlie and Andy have never lived in the same street.
Charlie and Andy have always been friends.
Andy's house number is not a 2 digit number.
Andy's house number is less than 30.
